product_name: Osprey UltraLight GrabBag Waistpack and Pack Pocket
long_description: Slip this ultralight pocket on your pack for extra quick-access storage on backpacking trips or wrap it around your waist for a minimalist lumbar pack on short hikes or side trips from camp.
short_description: Slip this ultralight pocket on your pack for extra quick-access storage on backpacking trips or wrap it around your waist for a minimalist lumbar pack on short hikes or side trips from camp.
